children.name: Default to Stackable
children.description: Enable to have the stackable variant be the default (e.g. items will drop as stackable).

children.name: Maximum Stack Size
children.description: The maximum quantity that each stack can have.

children.name: Convert When Destacking
children.description: Enable to have the split off gem automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.

children.name: Bulk Upgrade Recipe
children.description: Enable to add 30 to 10 bulk upgrade recipes (stack of 30 gems + 1 id scroll = stack of 10 gems of the next highest tier). Warning: this adds 6k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
